description: Signing in and out from an application

description.title: Sign in a user
description.content: This method can be used to sign in an user, and retrieve JWT

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: JSON Web Token provided for authorization

description: HireMe wants to match young people with the best opportunities. We use Achievements as a match criteria to ensure having good candidates. Achievements are all kind of non-education activities young people ever make.

description.title: List all achievements
description.content: Returns all achievements for current user. By default non filtering is applied.

params.name: active
params.description: Display only active and ongoing achievements

params.name: page
params.description: Current page for pagination

params.name: per_page
params.description: Number of achievements per page

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: JSON Web Token provided for authorization

description.title: Create achievement
description.content: Creates new achievement for authenticated user and returns newly saved object

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: JSON Web Token provided for authorization

params.name: achievement_id
params.description: Id of an achievement to be returned

description.title: Get achievement details
description.content: Returns all details for given achievement

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: JSON Web Token provided for authorization

params.name: achievement_id
params.description: Id of an achievement to be returned

description.title: Remove achievement
description.content: Removes achievement permanently

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: JSON Web Token provided for authorization

params.name: achievement_id
params.description: Id of an achievement to be returned

description.title: Update achievement
description.content: Updates all possible fields on achievement

description: HireMe wants to match young people with the best opportunities. We use Educations as a match criteria to ensure having good candidates. Educations are all kind of non-education activities young people ever make.

description.content: Returns all educations for current user. By default non filtering is applied.

params.name: active

description: Companies are one type of two types of account available on HireMe. User with Company account can post opportunities on a platform.

description.title: List all companies
description.content: Returns all companies for current user. By default non filtering is applied.

params.description: filter only active companies ('true' or 'false')
